summary: Beautified all the Female Forsworn/Bandit/Necromencer hair
descriptionHtml:
Title: NPC Enemy Beautification Overhaul
Category: NPC


==========
UPDATE
==========
v1.3 add some missing NPC like ice mage, hag and witch.. overwrite the old file
v1.3 Fix head and body texture mismatch now head texture looking better

===========
Description
===========

This mod beautified [b]all[/b] female bandit, forsworn, necromancer, witch, hag [Human Race Only]  

DLC Dawnguard is not included 


IMPORTANT: put the both .esp file in the last load order to prevent grey face.

BUG: Incompatible with latest apachii hair, some of npc will have purple texture. To fix that just download apachii hair v1.1, rename the .esp (eg. ApachiiHairV1.1.esp) and put in the data folder (.esp file ONLY, not the texture,meshes and .esm files!!). Also, I forgot to remove some of non enemy npc (some follower, about 10 npc) and will conflict with other npc mod (npc will have crappy face). To fix, disable other npc mod.

==============
Required File
==============
[Apachii Hair]
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10168 (download apachii hair v1.1)
[Coolsims Hair]
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3809
[Coverwomen]
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3563
[UNP body]
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6709


============
Installation
============

simply put meshes, textures and .esp file into your Skyrim data folder then check the .esp file

============
Uninstall
============

go to---> data/textures/actors/character/FaceGenData [Delete \"FaceGenData\" folder]
go to---> Data/meshes/actors/character/FaceGenData [Delete \"FaceGenData\" Folder]
Delete NPC_Hair_Replace_Necro.esp, and NPC_Hair_Replace_Bandit_Forsworn.esp

===========
Credits
===========
Apachii for the nice Apachii hair
Coolsims hair
Bethesda
CK tools
author: icikiro
